DOC.brief_summary: The investigators plan to use retrospective data to assess heart function and structure abnormalities through the use of an approved vasodilating agent for stress cardiac MRI tests. The investigators are interested in how these MRI findings relate to long-term prognosis in people who are at risk for cardiac disease.
DOC.brief_title: Role of Stress Cardiac MRI in Predicting Adverse Clinical Events in Patients With Known or Suspected Ischemic Heart Disease
DOC.criteria: Age >/= 21 years old No contraindications for cardiac MRI (by renal function or metallic hazards)
